title: Taylor Waters - The Bedroom Killer (epub).epub
description:
Dr. John Randall lost his wife and young son in a terrible car accident. His plan to take his own life on the anniversary of their deaths is interrupted when he is arrested as the prime suspect in The Bedroom Killer murder investigation. 

Sex is a problem for homicide detective Megan AshÃ¢â‚¬â€itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s getting in the way of her investigation. When John Randall's botched suicide puts the two of them in the same room it is only a matter of time before John becomes MeganÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s lover and confidant. But her supervisor, Detective Gerald Bell, doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t believe John to be the innocent he claims to be. He wants John out of the picture. 

As John and Megan deal with their inner demons, they find solace and possibly redemption in their shared motivations. When the Bedroom KillerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s identity is discovered, the investigation brings John, Megan, Gerald and others to an abandoned rail yard warehouse where Megan confronts her past head on and John is forced to make a life or death decision. What happens next will test John Randall and bring the Bedroom Killer investigation to a shocking conclusion. 

Combining a psychological cast of characters and an exciting chase for the killer, Mr. Waters puts Detective Megan Ash and John Randall through the corkscrewsÃ¢â‚¬â€making them question their choices, their growing love for one another, and whether a future together could ever really be possible. 

The Bedroom Killer is Taylor WatersÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ debut novel.
Genre: Mystery, Thriller
